review:
I want to share my experience of receiving treatment from Dr. Sumedha. I usually do not write any reviews, but the experience made me write this.

As everyone, I was always scared of hospitals and doctors, more so was scared with dental related issues due to my previous experience and the pain I had to go through. But my situation and health condition demanded that I visit a dentist. So, I began to search for a female doctor near by my home, so that I will be a bit more comfortable in explaining my fear towards dental issues. Accordingly, I reached out to Google and read many posts. I chanced upon a post regarding a dental care. I started reading more and post reading the google reviews, I decided that I would go to Sharanya Dental Care.

When I met Dr. Sumedha the first time, she made me so much comfortable that I almost forgot about my condition. The way she treated me was awesome. She was so patient with me, answering my so many doubts and unending questions. She was very patient in listening to me and the way she treated was very professional. Initially, I imagined that I would have to go through lot of pain. But surprisingly, here was a doctor who seems to believe in pain-free treatment. After a while I was so comfortable with her and the most satisfying factor was the painless treatment. She explained me each and every thing in-detail on what I should take care. Even post treatment she helped me offline when ever I faced any dental issues without hesitation. Although the clinic looks not so spacious, it is right on the main road and easy to access and commute. As for the question that rises in every mind, she charges very reasonably, unlike many others.

I really appreciate her work and patience. I definitely recommend her.

I was referred to Sharanya Dental Care by one of my colleagues.

Dr Sumedha was gentle in dealing with my problem of missing tooth.

She suggested an implant and convinced me that it was better than a bridge. Explained the pros and cons clearly.

Waiting for my cap to be fixed in the next sitting.

Doctor is punctual and humble and I would definitely suggest her for any tooth related issues to others.
Doctor was really welcoming and explained everything very clearly and made us understand about the issue we faced. Definitely will visit again if needed and will definitely recommend for all
So, I’d an appointment for my tooth with Dr Sumedha, and it was a nice experience with her. She was thorough, and she gave same good advice. She’s extremely friendly and humble.
reply_text: Thank you Mr. Shamrooz for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I have visited Dr Sumedha 3 to 4 times. She is very friendly and helpful. I get rid of my teeth pain after treatment. She gave very good advice. I definitely recommend.
I am very happy with the treatment and analysis provided by Doctor Sumedha. Dr Sumedha and hospital staff very polite and decent in providing guidance and treatment.
reply_text: Thank you for the valuable feedback!!

review: I got both my wisdom teeth removed it was good experience, they have put me in good medication so that pain reduced in less time
**** ***** ********* *** it was a great and safe experience. Definitely **** ***** ********* *** it was a great and safe experience. Definitely recommend .

I went to the clinic to extract milk tooth of my daughter. After going there the doctor denied to do the procedure because the oxygen reading in oxymeter came bit low as close to 87.  

Very disappointing experience.
reply_text:
We just wanted to postpone the treatment as the preliminary test on Pulse Oximeter was too low. 
Anyways, thanks for letting us know your feedback.

review:
It was good. She was spot on with my eating habits.
Also, pretty friendly and polite. Would recommend others as well.

Thanks
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback
